values: Jars of Clay: Pastoral Grit for the Glory of ChristJars of Clay: Pastoral Grit for the Glory of Christ

The apostle Paul was no stranger to ministry’s many strains. Yet for all his afflictions, he neither lost heart nor tampered with the truth. How?The apostle Paul was no stranger to ministry’s many strains. Yet for all his afflictions, he neither lost heart nor tampered with the truth. How?
